comments.body: The major and minor version of these type definitions should match that of the package they reflect, so I recommend leaving this as 2.0 (unless this is a pre-emptive change for a forthcoming release of iobroker v2.2).

@uniqueiniquity This is indeed for the 2.2 release.

By the way, why is your nickname so hard to type? ðŸ˜…
I thought it would be fun when I came up with it years ago... clearly wasn't thinking ahead enough. ðŸ˜† Might be worth a change someday.
